description:
This courses is full of information on Basic dog training and socialization of dogs, we go over the sit command, down command, Heeling, crate training, how to introduce your puppy to the house and to the older house dog. Included in this courses is a list of tools you will need to be successful in training

This courses is structured in short videos and notes

You need to take this course if you just got a puppy, adopted a new dog, or want to sharpen up your basic skills with your existing dog. If you want to go over the basic obedience training.

this course is a short and to the point course should be done in 45 min with review


Don't take anymore time away from building an amazing relationship between you and your dog, join the many others i have helped and join the course!
title: How to Train your dog/puppy, A basic Guide to training Fido!
